statements: SELECT user_id, email_address, last_interaction, total_interactions, purchase_count FROM user_behavior
SELECT email_address, user_id, total_interactions, purchase_count, last_interaction FROM user_behavior
SELECT * FROM user_behavior
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM user_behavior WHERE purchase_count > 0
SELECT user_id, total_interactions FROM user_behavior ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT user_id, email_address, total_interactions FROM user_behavior WHERE purchase_count > 5
SELECT email_address, total_interactions, last_interaction FROM user_behavior ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE purchase_count BETWEEN 2 AND 8 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT email_address, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_behavior GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(user_id) >= 2
SELECT DISTINCT email_address FROM user_behavior
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email_address FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address, last_login FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address FROM users WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address,last_login FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address,last_login FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, user_name, email_address, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM users JOIN user_behavior ON users.user_id = user_behavior.user_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email_address, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM users JOIN user_behavior ON users.user_id = user_behavior.user_id WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT email_address, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_subject, message_body FROM email_marketing ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT email_status, timestamp FROM email_logs WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, email_address, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing WHERE message_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, email_status, timestamp FROM email_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, message_subject FROM email_marketing WHERE message_subject LIKE '%important%' AND message_subject LIKE '%update%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails_sent FROM email_logs WHERE email_status = 'sent' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_emails_sent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, timestamp FROM campaign_logs WHERE user_id = 10 AND action_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM campaign_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, c.campaign_name FROM users u JOIN campaign_logs cl ON u.user_id = cl.user_id JOIN campaigns c ON c.campaign_id = cl.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaign_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND action_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT u.user_id) FROM users u JOIN campaign_logs cl ON u.user_id = cl.user_id WHERE cl.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_id, sent_emails, clicked_emails FROM campaign_stats WHERE opened_emails > 100;
